item.title: Sheep Among Wolves
item.description:
Sheep Among Wolves

It is no news that we live in a crazy world today. Jesus warned us that we would be like sheep among wolves. And we know that in order to survive in this crazy world where we live, we must be wise and prudent. In fact, as Jesus himself acknowledges, we are to be as wise as serpents in order to avoid getting devoured. All of us, while studying in this school of hard knocks, do tend to become wise as a result of the many challenges that we encounter. So, whatâ€™s the problem?
